author: barnabasbusa
content: Starting up all devnet 3 nodes now. And we should reach back to finality very soon.

author: barnabasbusa
content:
Ideal timeline for devnet 5 and beyond:

- Working fusaka trunk branches by all clients on 29th of Aug
- Devnet 5 launch on 3rd of Sep fulu a day later, bpo a day after that, till we hit bpo 5.
- Devnet 5 goes dead on the 10th of Sep
- 15th of Sep client teams prep for release for holesky/sepolia with BPO values
- A week later we fork holesky. 

Would this work for all?

author: __kasey__
content: That tracks with what we agreed in ACD. Does this push the [schedule](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1638) discussed 2 weeks ago at ACD back 1 week? Are we targeting 10/01 or 10/08 for mainnet releases? Would we also delay bug bounty 1 week?

author: barnabasbusa
content: <@199253896399421440> I think we should shift bug bounty start date by a week too indeed. What do you think ?

author: fredrik
content: Yes if teams will have client releases for the first testnets ready by the 15th then imo thatâ€™s when we should start the competition

author: ralexstokes
content:
i think we can still target 29 Sep for Sepolia, and then the question for me is if 1 Oct for Hoodi and mainnet releases leaves enough room (assuming sepolia goes well)

if we want to stick to 5 Nov mainnet, then we have the fairly hard constraint that we want 1 month before that for releases

author: ralexstokes
content: if a few more days is helpful in b/t sepolia forking and hoodi/mainnet releases then we could say 3 Oct for the release deadline
